title: It is easy to shut down and close yourself off after you’ve been hurt. It’s easy to toss away real love...

attachments.displayName:
It is easy to shut down and close yourself off after you’ve been hurt. It’s easy to toss away real love when it comes because you are scared/fearful.
Learn how to be more loving from your past pain, not how to be more closed.
Move forward in spite of your fear. Move into the scariness of it. Don't let your fear win.
Learn to value openness and rebuilding your heart more than safety. Don’t let the wounds of the past create a wounded future.
The risk of not opening, in the end, is far worse.  Don’t let love pass you by just because you were to afraid to try.
When you have a connection with someone, when you feel it, when you are so scared of how much you feel it, don't turn away. Face your fear and go in the direction of the person whose arms are open to you..
Believe in love and the desire to share life with someone . Let that motivate you to try again.

object.content:
It is easy to shut down and close yourself off after you’ve been hurt. It’s easy to toss away real love when it comes because you are scared/fearful. 
Learn how to be more loving from your past pain, not how to be more closed.
Move forward in spite of your fear. Move into the unknown/scariness of it. Don't let your fear win.
Learn to value openness and rebuilding your heart more than keeping it safe. Don’t let the wounds of the past create a wounded future.
The risk of not opening up and being more open, in the end, is far worse.  Don’t let love pass you by just because you were too afraid to try.
When you have a connection with someone, when you feel it, when you are so scared of how much you feel it,  don't turn away. Face your fear and go in the direction of the person whose arms are open to you..
Believe in love and the desire to share your life with someone . Let that motivate you to try again.
I Believe In Love Again and I am OK!!
